endpoints.description: Retrieve detailed information about all chemical stocks and their current levels.
Add a new chemical item to the inventory with relevant specifications.
Update the characteristics or storage information of a specific chemical item.
Remove a particular chemical item from the inventory.
Fetch the list of safety regulations and compliance rules relevant to the stored chemicals.
Create a notification or reminder for specific chemicals nearing minimum stock levels.
Gather statistics and analytics about chemical usage trends and inventory turnover.
Initiate a reorder process for chemicals that have reached minimum inventory thresholds.
Retrieve safety and environmental requirements for storing a specific chemical.
Access hazard and safety information for a particular chemical item.
